message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair starting point?
You wanted 4:1, I'll meet you in the middle
I'll give you a better deal, 7:3. You can have 4200, I'll take 5800.
You're getting a better deal than before, but I'm still not generous.
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal
I'll give you a slight increase, but I'm still taking the majority. 6500 for me, 3500 for you.
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't expect a better deal from me.
It's time to split it 50/50, no more games
I'm not sure if you're trying to trick me, but I'll give you a counteroffer. 6000 for me, 4000 for you.
You're getting desperate, Bob. Don't expect any mercy.
I'm not desperate, but I'm not getting any younger either. Meet me in the middle
I'll give you a counteroffer. 5200 for me, 4800 for you. Don't think you're getting the better deal.
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't expect a better deal from me.
Last chance, Alice. I'm not going to get a better deal than this
Alright, Bob. I'll take it. 4000 for me, 6000 for you. Let's end this game.
